names.pharmaceuticalLatin: Flos Caryophylli Gemma Eugeniae Flos Syzygii Aromatici

category: Herbs that Warm the Interior and Expel Cold

other: Essential Oil: 1-2 drops in a gel cap topped with Olive Oil

action.primary: Warms the Middle Jiao, relieves pain and descends Qi

indications: Stomach Cold with vomiting, hiccup, abdominal pain and diarrhea
Spleen and Stomach Deficiency Cold with anorexia, vomiting and diarrhea

action.primary: Warms the Kidneys and assists Yang

indications: Impotence or clear vaginal discharge from Cold in the Womb (usually accompanied by weak legs) due to Kidney Yang Deficiency

contraindications: Contraindicated for those with Febrile disease.
Contraindicated for those with Internal Heat
Contraindicated for those with Yin Deficiency.
incompatibilities: Do not combine with Tub. Curcumae #{YuJin} Yu Jin.

useCases: Abdominal pain and vomiting due to Stomach Cold.
Vomiting, diarrhea, and anorexia due to Spleen and Stomach Deficiency Cold.
Male impotence and female vaginal discharge due to Kidney Deficiency.
Persistent uterine bleeding with an ice-cold sensation in the lower abdomen.
Stops hiccup and reduces vomiting due to Stomach Cold.
Treats hiccup due to a combin-ation of Heat and Cold.
Coldness and pain in the epigastric and abdominal regions.

notes: This herb is similar in action to Fr. Evodiae #{WuZhuYu} Wu Zhu Yu, but is more important for the treatment of reflux Qi.
Some sources say that this herb unblocks the pulse.
Male Clove Gong Mu Xiang is more powerful.

Mother Clove Mu Dong Xiang is less powerful in descending Qi, but is effects last longer and are often combined with Gong Ding Xiang for a more powerful; longer lasting effect. Mu Ding Xiang also enters the Blood to invigorate Blood and induce labor. it has also been used topically to treat Cold vagina.
This herb has long been an ingredient in perfumes, incenses and herbal formulas.
Some sources say that this herb treats parasites.
Cx. Caryophylli Ding Xiang Pi is the bark of the same plant and is used to dispel Cold and relieve pain.
